targets.expr: SUM by (container, method) (rate(request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$service", endpoint="web", route!~"health|metrics"}[$AvgOver]))
SUM by (container, method, status_code) (rate(request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$service", status_code=~"[4|5].*", endpoint="web", route!~"health|metrics"}[$AvgOver]))

AVG by (container, method) (rate(request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", container="$service", status_code=~"[2|3].*", endpoint="web", route!~"health|metrics"}[$AvgOver]) / rate(request_duration_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$service", status_code=~"[2|3].*", endpoint="web", route!~"health|metrics"}[$AvgOver]))

histogram_quantile(($percentile/100), sum(rate(request_duration_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", container="$service", status_code=~"[2|3].*", endpoint="web", route!~"health|metrics"}[$AvgOver])) by (le))
sum by (pod) (rate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$service", pod="$pod", gc="G1 Young Generation"}[$AvgOver]))
sum by (pod) (rate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$service", pod="$pod", gc="G1 Old Generation"}[$AvgOver]))

AVG by (pod) 
(rate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", container="$service", pod="$pod", gc="G1 Young Generation"}[$AvgOver]) / rate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$service", pod="$pod", gc="G1 Young Generation"}[$AvgOver]))

AVG by (pod) 
(rate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", container="$service", pod="$pod", gc="G1 Old Generation"}[$AvgOver]) / rate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", container="$service", pod="$pod", gc="G1 Old Generation"}[$AvgOver]))
